title: Incense in a dream: Interpretation of a dream about incense for a married, pregnant, or single woman

preview.html: Dear brothers and sisters, welcome to all of you. The subject of our article is the interpretation of seeing incense in a dream, where we examine with you the most important interpretations in this regard, according to an Islamic approach, with a psychological analysis of this symbol. We wish you a good and useful workday, God willing. Incense in a dream as mentioned in the book Perfuming Al-Anam by Al-Nabulsi. Incense in the interpretation of dreams is a man of good virtue. Whoever dreams that he is holding incense in his hand, and he is one of those who lost something, he will regain it and hear good words. Whoever inhales the scent of firewood or sees its smoke will receive good news. Whoever sees a boy growing in his house, and after that he will be a leader among his people, or a guardian of their guardians, i.e. a ruler, a teacher, or an imam. Interpretation of incense in a dream for a single girl or girlIncense in a dream is good and it is one of the signs of goodness if he likes its smell while he is awake. . The smell of this incense. If people love the smell of his incense and then hear praise from them, then the dream indicates the honor that the girl will attain after patience or hardship. It has also been said that the good smell of incense in a dream indicates a good reputation and high morals, and the resemblance to incense in a dream is like smell and smell, and it is good for single and married women. And pregnant women.Interpretation of seeing incense in a married woman’s dream. Incense in a married woman’s dream is a sign of goodness. If she sees that it is burning or ignited in her home, then if the incense is smoke in the dream, it indicates good news and worthy of praise in the interpretation, and buying incense or a gift. Incense in a married woman’s dream. Sometimes it indicates the goodness of her husband and her good morals, and it is said that it is the woman’s luck and livelihood, and indicates guidance and piety. If a married woman sees that she is incensing the mosque or prayer place, and every dream in which its owner smells the scent of incense is the source of the optimism of God Almighty and the success of her children, and she sees in her dream fragrant incense because the news is success and this Interpretation is done in the patient. Who seeks healing. Scented incense in a divorced woman’s dream indicates the return of the divorced woman. This interpretation is based on the word and is widely spread in some Arab countries, but there is nothing to support it in the dream interpretation books. Interpretation of seeing incense in a pregnant woman’s dream. Incense in a pregnant woman’s dream is also a sign. Good, and the origin of this interpretation is that the smell and the sweet scent in it is an expression of joy or healing and perhaps the removal of suffering and worries. If a pregnant woman sees that the smell of an incense stick is spread throughout the house or house, then the dream in this picture may indicate a male child whose reputation will be in the future. Very good, as the great translator Abdul Ghani Al pointed out. - Al-Nabulsi in his famous book (The Smell of Creatures in the Interpretation of Dreams), which is the main reference that we relied on in formulating this article. Interpretation of incense in a dream Incense in a dream indicates praise or good words, and they said: Whoever sees incense burning and then smells a pleasant scent will receive a reward or reward in his waking life. A good gift, as they said that incense in a dream is a man who praises, has good morals, and is a source of optimism, whether it is in livelihood, work, or worldly affairs.

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dog bite in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a dog bite in a dream and its interpretation: Dreaming about a dog has only a special meaning. As for the dog bite, it is another sign that you should pay attention and know the meaning of this disturbing dream. We present to you the interpretation of a dog bite in a dream in detail by Imam Nabulsi and Imam Ibn Sirin. A dog bite in a dreamIn the interpretation of Imam Ibn Sirin, seeing a dog has many interpretations, the most important of which are the following: Seeing a dog in a dream indicates the presence of a cunning and treacherous enemy, and the dreamer must reconsider his dream. What is around it and get to know it. A person who sees a dog biting each other indicates that the person will be betrayed while walking an unhealthy path. What is the interpretation of a dog bite in a dream? Seeing a dog bite may indicate someone’s desire to steal the dreamer’s money. It was also interpreted that The dreamer has committed sins and immorality. A dog bite in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a dreamer who sees a dog biting in a dream as evidence that there is someone close to him who is trying to cause him great harm and he must be careful to be safe from his harm. If one sees a dog being bitten in his dream This is a sign that he will be betrayed by those close to him and that he will enter a state of great sadness because of his misplaced trust. In the event that the dreamer notices a dog bite during his sleep, this expresses the unpleasant events that will occur around him, which will put him in a state of extreme discomfort. Seeing the dreamer being bitten by a dog in a dream symbolizes the unpleasant news that he will receive, which will make him enter a state of severe depression. If one sees a dog being bitten in his dream, this is a sign of the presence of many difficulties and problems that he is suffering from at that time and his inability to To solve it makes him feel uncomfortable. A dog bites in a dream for a single girl. Seeing one dog in a dream indicates the presence of a person characterized by malice and malice, and one must pay attention to him. A single girl sees a black dog in a dream, some of which indicate the presence of a very hypocritical, treacherous and hateful person to her, But it shows her love and loyalty. I dreamed that a dog bit me on my leg for an unmarried woman. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream being bitten by a dog on her leg indicates the presence of a malicious young man who is trying to get very close to her at that time and deceive her with sweet words and she must not fall into his trap. If the dreamer sees during His dream is that the dog is biting his leg, this indicates the presence of a very close friend who does not love her at all and wants to cause great harm to her. If the dreamer sees a dog biting his leg in his dream, this means that she will be betrayed by the people closest to her and as a result she will enter a state of severe depression For the dreamer to see in a dream a dog biting her leg symbolizes many changes that will occur in her life that will not be satisfactory to her at all. If a girl sees in her dream a dog biting her leg, this is a sign that someone will marry her, but it will not suit her and she will reject him as a result. Immediately.Interpretation of a dream about a dog bite. Seeing an unmarried woman with a dog in a dream indicates the presence of a girl or a mirror characterized by shrewdness with a feeling of envy and hatred. Seeing a white dog in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about an open bathroom door by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a bathroom door open: The toilet is one of the places where the door must be closed so that one does not reveal his private parts in front of anyone, and when you see that the bathroom door is open in a dream, it contains signs and evidence from which the interpretation can be learned. From this dream and what will come back to the dreamer, whether good or bad. Through our article, we will present the largest number of cases and interpretations of leading scholars and interpreters such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about an open bathroom door. Seeing a dream about an open bathroom door carries many signs and associations that can be identified through the cases. Next: A dream that shows that the bathroom door is open in a dream indicates the marriage of a single person and his stability in his life. If the dreamer sees in his dream that the bathroom door is open, this symbolizes a great abundance of wealth and abundant money that he will obtain from work or a lawful inheritance. Seeing the bathroom door Open in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires that the dreamer thought would be impossible. Interpretation of a dream about an open bathroom door by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin dealt with the interpretation of the symbol of an open bathroom door in a dream, and the following are some of the interpretations given in this regard: Ibn Sirin interprets seeing the bathroom door open in a dream However, it indicates that the dreamer will get rid of the problems and difficulties he faced in the previous period. If the dreamer sees the bathroom door open in his dream and removes it from its place, this symbolizes great discoveries and many good things coming to him. The bathroom door is open in the dreamer’s dream, which indicates That he heard good news and joys arrived to him. Interpretation of a dream about an open bathroom door for single women. The interpretation of a dream that the bathroom door is open in a dream varies according to the marital status of the dreamer, and the following is the interpretation of the unmarried girl who sees this symbol: The unmarried girl who sees in her dream that the bathroom door is open It shows her alertness to everything that happens around her and her wisdom in the balance of matters. If a single woman sees that her bathroom door is open in a dream, this symbolizes the disappearance of her worries and sorrows and the enjoyment of happiness and tranquility in the coming period. Seeing the bathroom door open in a single woman’s dream indicates that her prayers will be answered and her desires will be fulfilled. And her dreams. The bathroom door is open in the dream of an unmarried woman, good news about her imminent marriage to a handsome young man with whom she will be very happy. Interpretation of a dream of an open bathroom door for a married woman. A married woman who sees in her dream that the bathroom door is open indicates that there are some marital disputes and problems that have arisen between them. But she is able to repair the relationship and overcome this difficult stage. If a married woman sees the bathroom door wide open in her dream, this symbolizes abundant livelihood and the large sum that her husband will receive from his work and it will change their lives for the better. The bathroom door is not closed in a married woman’s dream. Good news about the good condition of her children, their bright future, and their abundant nutrition. Interpretation of dreams about the bathroom door open for a pregnant woman.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a black car in a dream about a man in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black car in a dream: A car in a dream is a sign of moving from one place to another or from one life to another. It also indicates a new job. A dream about a black car indicates a way out of poverty and a transition to wealth, which makes the dreamer able to meet his needs and demands. It also indicates Ambition and effort to study. The vision indicates that you will find a new job that is better than the previous one. It indicates the repayment of the debtor’s debts. The car is black in a dream. Seeing a black car but in a dark color indicates that he is facing a series of difficulties and crises that make the viewer stop using it, or that he is spending a lot Of money to repair it until it returns to what it was before. It may indicate a shock that the viewer is exposed to, whether in his personal or professional life. The vision means that the dreamer will fall into a major disaster or misfortune. It may indicate the death of one of the people close to the dreamer. Or it indicates an illness. Dangerous and sick. It may indicate a major accident that affects the viewer psychologically and makes him live isolated from society. Interpretation of a black car in a single man’s dream: A single man who is in a relationship with a girl he loves when he dreams of a black car is considered a sign of the presence of many obstacles that prevent him from reaching His beloved. It also indicates his engagement to a beautiful girl who differs from him in culture, thought, and temperament, and he is thinking of divorcing her. Interpretation of a black car in a married man’s dream. A black car in a married man’s dream indicates his marriage to a rich and powerful woman who will help him succeed and achieve his goals. Perhaps it indicates the presence of disagreements. Between him and his wife. It also indicates the dreamer’s feeling of sadness because of his infertility and his inability to have children. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, with reference to the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Seeing barbecue in a dream and interpretation of dreams about barbecue

preview.html: Seeing barbecue in a dream symbolizes severe stress and illness, if it is not cooked, and if the barbecue is cooked in the dream, this is good news for a good life. And the dream of grilling kebab indicates extreme cruelty, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing barbecue in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing barbecue in a dream as good news in the dreamer's life, especially if it is cooked, and if it is not cooked, the boy is the boy, and whoever sees that he is grilling a ram in a dream gets sick or is tortured by a sultan or imprisoned, and seeing a sheep grilled in a dream indicates the illness of the wife, mother, or woman from the dreamer's family. A dream of grilling a calf for someone who asked for a boy then foretells the boy or defeats his enemies and gets out of distress, and seeing a camel grilled in a dream means honor and joy, the well-being of the patient, the marriage of the unmarried, the arrival of the traveler, and seeing grilled chicken in a dream. Sustenance and honor. Al-Nabulsi says: Whoever sees himself grilling on coals in a dream, disciplines boys and maids, teaches them an art, and may gain the power to extort the Sultan's money by injustice and confiscation, and it is said that grilling in a dream shows a man who speaks obscene and quarrelsome words, and perhaps a prison guard, and goes to a barbecue party to buy cooked meat in a dream for someone who has a boy. He delivers it to someone he knows and disciplines him. Ibn Shaheen says: “Seeing a barbecue in a dream means earning money from fatigue.” And whoever sees that he is grilling veal in a dream, this indicates safety from the year of the dream, and if he sees that he is grilling a lamb in a dream, it means that he will get some money and friendship, and whoever sees that he is eating grilled bird meat in a dream, this indicates that he will get money by cunning and deception, and if you see that you are eating grilled chicken meat in a dream, this indicates that you will get some money by cunning. And deceiving women, and God knows best. Interpretation of the smell of barbecue in a dream The smell of barbecue in a dream indicates distress and anxiety. Whoever smells the smell of barbecue in his home in a dream, this indicates that he will enter into trials and tribulations, and seeing the smell of barbecue in the street in a dream indicates deception from the truth, and a dream of smelling the smell of barbecue in an unknown place indicates a bad reputation among people. Whoever sees that he smells a strong smell of barbecue and thick smoke in a dream, this indicates dispersion and harm, and if he sees a light smell of barbecue in a dream, this means fatigue and harm. A dream of suffocation from the smell of barbecue indicates that you are going through difficult times. Seeing a grill in a dream Al-Nabulsi says: “Seeing a frying pan in a dream means looting money and captivity.” Whoever sees that he is carrying a grill pan in a dream, this indicates spending forbidden money, and the dream of preparing a grill pan indicates jihad in an illegal act, and seeing fire from a grill pan in a dream indicates punishment and retribution. Sins. A dream about losing a grill portends the loss of money stolen from others, and seeing the purchase of a grill in a dream means entering into a dubious business. Burning barbecue charcoal in a dream means that you have been seduced, and seeing charcoal burning on a barbecue grill in a dream indicates many problems and troubles, and a dream about extinguishing barbecue charcoal with water means

Dreaming of grilling kebabs indicates extreme cruelty, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing barbecue in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In a dream, it indicates the illness of the wife, mother, or woman from the dreamer’s family. Sustenance and honor. Al-Nabulsi says: Whoever sees himself grilling over embers in a dream, disciplines boys and maids, and teaches them an art, and may obtain the power to extort the Sultan’s money through injustice and confiscation, and it is said that barbecuing in a dream appears. A man speaks obscene and quarrelsome words, perhaps a prison guard, and goes to a barbecue to buy ripe meat in a dream for someone who has a son. He hands it over to someone he knows and disciplines him. Ibn Shaheen says: “Seeing a barbecue in a dream means earning money through hard work.” Whoever sees that he is grilling veal in a dream, this indicates safety from the year of the dream, and if he sees that he is grilling a sheep in a dream, it means that he will get some Money, friendship, and whoever sees it. He is eating grilled bird meat in a dream, this indicates that money will be obtained through cunning and deception, and if you see that you are eating grilled chicken meat in a dream, this indicates that you will obtain some money through cunning. And deceiving women, and God knows best. Interpretation of the smell of barbecue in a dream. The smell of barbecue in a dream indicates distress and anxiety. Whoever smells the smell of barbecue in his home in a dream, this indicates that he will enter into trials and tribulations. Seeing the smell of barbecue in the street in a dream indicates deception from the truth, and a dream of smelling the smell. The smell of barbecue in an unknown place indicates a bad reputation among people. Whoever sees that he smells a strong smell of barbecue and thick smoke in a dream, this indicates distraction and harm, and if he sees a light smell of barbecue in the dream, this means fatigue and harm. A dream about suffocating from the smell of barbecue indicates that you You are going through difficult times. Seeing a grill in a dream. Al-Nabulsi says: “Seeing a frying pan in a dream means plundering of money and captivity.” Whoever sees that he is carrying a grill tray in a dream, this indicates spending illicit money, and dreaming of preparing a grill pan indicates jihad in an illegal act, and seeing fire From a grill pan in a dream indicates punishment and retribution. Sins. A dream of losing a grill portends the loss of money stolen from others, and seeing buying a grill in a dream means getting into a questionable business. Burning barbecue charcoal in a dream means that you have been deceived, and seeing charcoal burning on a barbecue grill in a dream indicates many problems and troubles, Dreaming of extinguishing barbecue charcoal with water

title: Interpretation of dreams about feces or excrement in a dream and its effects and interpretation of feces in front of people

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about feces in a dream or feces in a dream. Seeing feces in a dream has many and multiple indicators, and each interpretation varies according to the dreamer’s condition and the details of the vision. On the In True Dreams website, we will learn about the true interpretations of this dream. Follow us. Interpretation of a dream about excrement by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of a dream about excrement in a dream indicates comfort and the removal of worries and sorrow. The interpretation of a dream about excrement in a dream also shows that debt has been paid and repentance and distance from what God Almighty has forbidden. As for the interpretation of a dream about defecation in a dream, it may indicate acceptance of the debt. Seeing defecation in a dream also indicates relief and comfort for the viewer if the viewer is suffering or his circumstances are difficult. See also: Interpretation of urine in a dream Interpretation of a dream of feces on the floor Interpretation of a dream of defecating with clothes Interpretation of a dream of defecating with clothes in a dream may indicate committing immorality and falling into major sins. Interpretation of a dream about feces on clothes in a dream may indicate bad words that affect the dreamer. As for the interpretation of a dream about defecating on the bed in a dream, it may indicate the dreamer’s illness or his wife’s illness. Interpretation of a dream about feces in front of people: I dreamed that I defecated in front of people, so what does this mean? Interpretation of a dream Feces in front of people is one of the unpleasant dreams in dreams, but the interpretation depends on the vision. Interpretation of a dream of feces in front of people may indicate that the dreamer has committed many bad things or committed a sin. title: Interpretation of laughter in a dream and seeing or hearing laughter in a dream

preview.html: Seeing or hearing laughter in a dream can occur in different situations and images. In a dream we may laugh out loud, or we may laugh so hard that we lie down, and the laughter may just be a smile. The dream you had and the answers to some of these questions: Is laughing in a dream good? What is the interpretation of laughter in a single woman’s dream? What is the interpretation of a dream of laughing with friends? What is the interpretation of laughter in a dream for a married woman? What is the interpretation of sarcasm in a dream? What is the cause of laughter in sleep? Interpretation of seeing or hearing the sound of laughter in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Laughter in a dream indicates joy and happiness if it is not laughter or lying on the back, and if it is, then it also means crying. If the laughter is from a joke, it indicates a lack of chivalry for the one who is joking in wakefulness. As well as laughing at imitation, it is evidence of falling into forbidden things, and it is said that he saw that he was laughing. . Then it heralds goodness and bliss. And whoever sees: his laughter smiles, he is just, wise, and psychologically balanced. And whoever sees: the earth laughs, this is his interpretation of goodness, and if you see the dead laughing, then he is in heaven, and laughter, lightness, and frivolity, especially from fate, shows their isolation. If you dream that you are laughing And you feel happy, it means good luck or abundance of supply. Laughing without moderation indicates loss of position and loss of prestige. A child laughing in a dream or dream is a good sign and happy news. Laughing at others, whether they are friends or family members, indicates people's anger Those around you. Laughter resulting from sarcasm is a sign that you have faced a big problem or a serious problem, or that you are hearing disturbing news. Interpretation of seeing or hearing laughter in a dream according to Khalil bin Shaheen Al-Dhahiri. As for laughter in a dream, it means intensity and distress, and if it is with laughter, it will be more, according to the Almighty’s words. : “Let them laugh a little and cry a lot.” And whoever sees: that she laughs with a smile, this is good news and an accomplishment of what God Almighty said: “So she smiled, laughing at her words.” And whoever sees that she laughs with a smile, it is good news for the boy, according to the words of God Almighty: {So We laughed at her, so We gave good tidings to Isaac. Laughing in a dream | Interpretation of a dream about laughter by Al-Nabulsi: Laughter in a dream indicates joy and happiness if he is not laughing. If the laughter in the dream is loud, even on the back, then it indicates its opposite or opposite, and what is meant by this is crying or sadness... What is laughter? Laughter is laughter that is loud and annoying at times and usually occurs among a group of people as a result of sarcasm, jokes, or humor. Al-Nabulsi adds in his book “Tatir Al-An’am” to the interpretation of the dream: If the laughter is a joke, a mockery, a mockery, or a mockery, then in the dream it indicates the absence of chivalry for the dreamer or the joker in waking life. It was also said in the interpretation of dreams for laughter: Laughter comes from imitation or Imitation indicates falling into a prohibition or prohibition. As for someone who dreams of laughing quietly without making an annoying sound like laughter, this portends a happy event. If he marries or his wife becomes pregnant, the good news is a son, God willing. Whoever sees in a dream that his laugh is like a soft or gentle smile, then this is a sign. On the integrity of a person in his religion and in his world. As for the dead person who laughs,

title: Interpretation of a dream about a husband who lives far from his wife in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a husband moving away from his wife in a dream, seeing a husband moving away from his wife in a dream is one of the visions that leads to creating a feeling of insecurity and anxiety and even raises many questions. Related to this dream, as it is considered one of the dreams that many women dream of. It has many different meanings and interpretations, and through this article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about a husband moving away from his wife in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a husband living away from his wife in a dream The wife's vision of her husband in a dream that she is moving away from her or even leaving her without any of the reasons that indicate the presence of differences or problems between the spouses or even a warning of separation between them and it has many different interpretations. The dream of a husband that his wife is away in a dream is as follows: The wife who sees her husband away from her in a dream or leaves her without reason indicates many disagreements and problems between the spouses, indicating the emergence of separation between them. Seeing the husband rebuking his wife in a dream shows the love between them. A woman who sees her husband dead in a dream is a sign of a calamity or a feeling of great sadness. Seeing the husband in a dream while he is anxious portends an illness that afflicts the husband or a family member. Seeing a sick husband in a dream means that the husband does not treat his wife with respect and does not treat her kindly. And that the wife sees her husband in a hateful situation and this situation raises fear and justifies it for the emergence of major problems, and this indicates a lack of agreement between the spouses or a lack of love between them. And that a woman's vision of her marriage to her husband in a dream indicates an increase in the responsibilities of both of them, as well as the birth of children, the difficulty of raising them, and the husband's preoccupation with them and their interest in worldly matters. As well as staying away from religion, or goodness, money, display, and beauty for the woman he marries, the husband deals with his wife. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a broken tooth in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of divorce between spouses in a dream Seeing divorce for married people is one of the dreams that prompts the viewer to quickly search for an interpretation of divorce in a dream, and the interpretation of divorce between spouses in a dream is as follows: Seeing a man divorcing his wife in a dream without violent manifestations between the spouses, this indicates kindness, money and wealth. Also, seeing a man divorcing his wife and living away from her indicates that he will lose his job, whether it is a long, short or permanent period. Seeing the wife's divorce in a dream is accompanied by some violence and indicates losses in money, work and many properties. And the dream of a husband divorcing his wife who is afflicted with diseases is a warning of the wife's death, and vice versa if the husband is sick. See also: Interpretation of dreams that I was pregnant during my marriage by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream of a husband moving away from his wife in Ibn al-Nabulsi This vision leads to the creation of feelings and sensations in the dreamer, but after safety and anxiety, it is considered one of the dreams that include many interpretations different from the other, depending on the dreamer's condition and the dream. The husband’s distance from his wife, according to Ibn al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, is evidence of abandonment.

title: Interpretation of seeing travel in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Also, the details accompanying the trip in a dream depend on the precise interpretation of the dream, and since the trip is one of the dreams that can disturb some people, we will discover its interpretation now for single people. Interpretation of seeing travel in a dream for a single woman: To see an unmarried woman traveling in her dream is interpreted as follows: The dream appears That she has a desire to get rid of what she is in real life. If she accepts travel in the dream and is satisfied with it, this is evidence that she will get married in the coming period. The dream indicates that there is someone who is trying hard to propose to her. If she uses the train in her travels in the dream, then this The dream is a promising vision, as it indicates that her situation will change for the better. If she also sees that she has moved from one place to another, this is an indication that her life will undergo transformations and changes. Traveling in general in a girl’s dream is evidence that she has a strong personality and strong self-confidence when taking all Her decisions. If in a dream she travels on foot, this indicates that she will choose the right path after facing some difficulties in her life. If she travels in time in a dream, this is an unpleasant vision, indicating that she will suffer from some problems in her life. Traveling by sea by ship, The interpretation of the dream depends on the waves, in the case of high waves mixed with storms. The dream indicates that she will face some problems in her life, but if she is calm, this is evidence of the stability of her real life. If in the dream she is traveling by plane, this is evidence that she will be able to fulfill her desires. What she wants to achieve, and if she sees the passport, this is a sign that her flight is approaching. Seeing the airport while he is there shows that her life will change. If she uses the car to travel with him, this is a good omen for her to get a high and good grade. If she is traveling with her family, this is an indication of That she will soon receive a lot of profits and gains through her family. If she travels with her family, this is evidence that she needs to stay away from the pressures she faces for a while until she feels comfortable. If her family is sad about her trip in a dream, this is an indication that she will soon live in a state Sadness. See also: Interpretation of dreams about changing clothes for a married woman. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of the vision of traveling in a dream for a single woman. Imam Al-Nabulsi interpreted the vision of an unmarried woman traveling in a dream as follows: Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing an unmarried girl traveling long distances in her dream is a good vision and indicates her engagement at the right time. Short. She interpreted her vision of traveling abroad as a desire to meet new people and enter into a new life. If she was traveling in a dream to a place she did not know, and in her hand was a black bag, this is evidence that she would divorce after her marriage. If she was going to travel in the dream but it receded, This is a sign that he will comfort her and relieve her of her worries. Seeing travel in a dream generally means that the dreamer will see big changes in his life. If the dreamer is sick and sees in a dream that he is traveling, this is a sign of his approaching death, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing.
